fixes.name: Pre Month Value - 0
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF expression to DAX IF and mapped the referenced calculated field to 'Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Pre Month Value - YoY]. Returns the arrow symbol when the YoY value equals 0, otherwise an empty string.
